channel.title: CVE Feed for Hilscher -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hilscher -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20987|2024-09-16T16:23:03.443Z -- hilscher -- ethernet%2Fip%20core%20v2
item.description: A denial of service and memory corruption vulnerability was found in Hilscher EtherNet/IP Core V2 prior to V2.13.0.21that may lead to code injection through network or make devices crash without recovery.

item.title: CVE-2021-20988|2024-09-16T17:49:09.628Z -- hilscher -- rcx%20rtos
item.description: In Hilscher rcX RTOS versions prios to V2.1.14.1 the actual UDP packet length is not verified against the length indicated by the packet. This may lead to a denial of service of the affected device.
